questions.question: Are you comfortable with array and string manipulation problems?
Have you implemented linked list operations?
Do you understand stacks and queues implementation?
Have you solved tree and graph traversal problems?
Are you familiar with various sorting and searching algorithms?
Have you solved dynamic programming problems?
Are you comfortable with recursive problem solving?
Do you understand time and space complexity analysis?
Have you used hash tables to solve optimization problems?
Have you practiced coding interview problems regularly?
